articles.title: Diablo IV Vessel of Hatred Launch Roundtable Q&A – Blizzard Dives into Every Aspect of the Expansion - Wccftech
articles.description: With only a few days left before the debut of Diablo IV Vessel of Hatred, Blizzard spilled the beans on every major feature of the expansion.
articles.content: As part of their Diablo IV Vessel of Hatred review program, Blizzard set up a roundtable Q&A with all the reviewers involved to answer practically every major question about the expansion due to … [+18972 chars]
